alert.note: Alert for Cape Fairweather to Cape Suckling Coastal Area (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 04 at 6:24PM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...POTENTIALLY VERY WINDY LATE WEDNESDAY INTO EARLY THURSDAY MORNING FOR THE NORTHEAST GULF COAST AND PORTIONS OF THE EASTERN GULF COAST... Gusty winds increase late Wednesday and could approach 60 mph Wednesday night. Uncertainty is still present on whether such high winds will develop. Should a powerful Gulf of Alaska storm make landfall in the northern Panhandle, high winds are far less likely in Yakutat, but could happen in Pelican and Elfin Cove. However, should the storm track farther west from the Panhandle, Yakutat could see far greater impacts, while Elfin Cove and Pelican may see few impacts. Periods of moderate rain will also accompany the system.

area.areaDesc: Cape Fairweather to Cape Suckling Coastal Area
